member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC
member.summary: Describes the subresources from a resource that are accessible by using a render-target view.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.Format
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the viewing format.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.ViewDimension
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies how the render-target resource will be accessed. This type specifies how the resource will be accessed. This member also determines which _RTV to use in the following union.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.Buffer
member.summary: A structure that specifies which buffer elements can be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.Texture1D
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 1D texture that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.Texture1DArray
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 1D texture array that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.Texture2D
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 2D texture that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.Texture2DArray
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a 2D texture array that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.Texture2DMS
member.summary: A structure that specifies a single subresource because a multisampled 2D texture only contains one subresource.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.Texture2DMSArray
member.summary: A structure that specifies the subresources in a multisampled 2D texture array that can be accessed.

member.name: D3D12_RENDER_TARGET_VIEW_DESC.Texture3D
member.summary: A structure that specifies subresources in a 3D texture that can be accessed.
